info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 9 at 6:37PM EDT until July 9 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh NC
info.description:
FFWRAH
The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Davidson County in central North Carolina... Eastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Guilford County in central North Carolina... Western Randolph County in central North Carolina...
* Until 1030 PM EDT.
* At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Greensboro, Winston-Salem, High Point, Asheboro, Lexington, Randleman, Badin Lake, Thomasville, Kernersville, McLeansville, Archdale, Summerfield, Trinity, Stokesdale, Walkertown, Pleasant Garden, Jamestown, Denton, Oak Hollow Marina and Randleman Regional Reservior Marina.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:30 PM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:30 PM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Davidson, NC; Forsyth, NC; Guilford, NC; Randolph, NC

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:30 PM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:30 PM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Davidson, NC; Forsyth, NC; Guilford, NC; Randolph, NC
